message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. Is this something you'd like to consider?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, $8000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $10000. Is this a price you'd be willing to pay?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $9000?

I understand that you're still a bit short on budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $10500. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me at this price.
I'm still interested in the product, but I really can't go any higher than $8000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
